title: 33 32 33 "The Marked Marksman""Usopp Dead?! When is Luffy Going to Make Landfall?!"Transliteration: "Usoppu Shisu? Rufi Jōriku wa Mada?" (Japanese:ウソップ死す!?ルフィ上陸はまだ?) Yukio Kaizawa Michiru Shimada 213.1 July 19, 2000(2000-07-19)[61] May 7, 2005[63]
transformers_text:
33 32 33 "The Marked Marksman""Usopp Dead?! When is Luffy Going to Make Landfall?!"Transliteration: "Usoppu Shisu? Rufi Jōriku wa Mada?" (Japanese:ウソップ死す!?ルフィ上陸はまだ?) Yukio Kaizawa Michiru Shimada 213.1 July 19, 2000(2000-07-19)[61] May 7, 2005[63]

After Zoro escapes with Nami's help, she tries to prove her loyalty to the Arlong Pirates by appearing to kill Usopp. Meanwhile, Luffy's group finally arrives at the island.
